price: Na walikuwa wakishikilia kufanya madhambi makubwa,
footnotes: Na walikuwa wameshikilia daima kufanya dhambi kubwa kabisa, kwani waliapa kwa Mwenyezi Mungu kwamba kabisa Mwenyezi Mungu hatamfufua aliye kufa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
